title: Sample
medium:
Medium: silk and lurex warps, viscose rayon wefts
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft (brocade)
inscribed: Written on mount by Trude Guermonprez. "INLAY TECHNIQUE, T.GUERMONPREZ"
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: A sample of metallic gold and white with brown, gold and red silk brocading. Sample set into heavy paper mount.
